markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Abundant Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=482)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 401 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 15 feet or more

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries. You teleport up to a distance equal to your Speed within your line of sight.
name: Abundant Step
